name: Project Apocalypse
description:
Post-apocalyptic city builder with zombies and cubes.

Build a camp for survivors. Improve and upgrade it with different buildings. Craft and trade items. Protect your camp from the infected. Survive.

Roadmap

  • More buildings. Social, Industry, leisure, defence and other categories.
  • Detailed character needs and stats. Hunger, stress, comfort and more.
  • Management system. Different jobs and orders.
  • Improved AI. Different behaviours, character archetypes.
  • Trade and Industry system. Produce and trade goods with other camps (AI-controlled)
  • Three game modes. Infinite Survival, Objective-based Missions and Sandbox.
  • Camp decoration and customization system, so you can make it truly Your camp.
  • Improved visuals and sounds.

Planned development timeline

  • 2019:
  • November - Pre-alpha. Polishing, Survival game mode, different buildings, AI tweaks and improvements, completed game loop.
  • December - Early Access, Sandbox game Mode.
  • 2020:
  • January - Character needs and stats
  • February - Management system, tasks and orders
  • March - Trade and Industry
  • April - Camp customization, Sandbox mode tweaks.
  • May - Extra-month for unplanned things. AI, VFX, Sound, Visual and other tweaks.
  • June - Feature-complete version, polishing, bugfixes and powergoals.
  • July - Release

Powergoals

  • Raids. Gather a raid party and sent it to different dangerous places.
  • Interactive Text Events and mini-quests
  • Character skills and leveling
  • Missions
